p.strong: #SaferAtHome EFFECTIVE 8:00 AM - WEDNESDAY, MARCH 25, 2020: EMERGENCY ORDER #12 All individuals present within the State of Wisconsin are ordered to stay at home or at their place of residence, with exceptions outlined in the order.

p.b: #SaferAtHome Extended EFFECTIVE 8:00 AM - FRIDAY, APRIL 24TH, 2020: EMERGENCY ORDER #28

p.strong: For full #12 order details, click HERE. For full #28 order details, click HERE.

div.p: Outagamie County Public Health encourages individuals and businesses to follow these orders to help us to prevent the spread of COVID-19.

Outagamie County Public Health staff is actively working in response to COVID-19. We understand that there are many questions and concerns regarding the situation and are doing our best to address those by updating our COVID-19 page on this site as well as our Facebook page. Our team remains focused on preventing, promoting, and protecting the health of all residents here in Outagamie County.

div.p: NOTICE: Information presented on this website is general in nature and is not intended to be used as a substitute for appropriate professional advice. For more information, contact us at (920) 823-5100 or click here to email us. Because of confidentiality concerns, questions regarding client health issues cannot be responded to by email. Notice of Privacy Practices.
